data.event: After symptoms were reported late on 2 August, the farm was isolated.
Following testing, officials from Defra (Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs) confirmed the outbreak on 3 August.

event.title: Saturday, when another meeting of Cobra was held

data.event: Brown cut short his holiday in Dorset to return to London on Saturday, when another meeting of Cobra was held.

event.title: The last outbreak of foot-and-mouth in the UK was in 2001

data.event: The last outbreak of foot-and-mouth in the UK was in 2001.

event.title: imported during the last ten days

data.event: In France, the government has asked for all the animals imported during the last ten days to be tested.
